vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
σπᾰτᾰλ-άω,
live softly or in excessive comfort or indulgence, [NT+2nd c.BC+]; τὰ σπαταλῶντα τῶν παιδίων spoilt children, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to live in pleasure, in self-indulgence indulge
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to live in pleasure, in self-indulgence indulge
to live luxuriously, voluptuously, wantonly, 1Tim. 5:6; Jas. 5:5*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: vivir en autocomplacencia, vivir en lujo
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sống trác táng; sống xa hoa
